sub_title: Service Architect Business Analyst at Philips
summary:
To give a brief about my profile, I would like to highlight my work experience.
I am currently working as a Management Consulting Analyst with Accenture Capability Network SC&O since Feb’21. The role has not only given me opportunity to expand my horizons in Business Process Management space, but also tightened my grip on Process Mining tools and strategies.

In my previous organization – Cognizant Technology services, I served as WFM Analytics BA (Workforce Management Analytics Business Analyst) for about 2.5 years. The role gave me the opportunity to manage the WFM Project for Life Science Business Unit and to put analytics into practice for organizations productivity and revenue improvement.

Over the span of close to 4 years I have worked with various tools like ;

BiZZdesign Enterprise Studio

UiPath StudioX

Power BI

Microsoft office

R/Python Language

ProHance


In my tenure at Cognizant, I have mastered the art of stakeholder management and change management. Also gained a strong grip on Advance Excel based analysis and dashboard building.

I have done Internship at Times Group - TimesPro as Market Research Intern wherein I worked to do competitor analysis and develop a suitable marketing strategy for the new product to be launched by Times Groups.

I did my summer internship at OTET Infosystems for 2 months, an End-To-End ERP solution for schools and hospitals. My responsibilities included B2B sales and Digital Media Marketing of their products.

I have also worked at Atticus Advisors for 4 months as Account Manager and was accountable for B2B Marketing and managed administrative tasks for the smooth functioning of consulting services offered.

Prior to my MBA, I was a Software Engineer at Accenture for 2 years and 7 months. I worked there as Java Developer for Financial Services and Communication, Media and Technology (CMT) Domain related projects. 

At SIMSR, I had the opportunity to be the Convener of FORSE (Forum Operations Research and Supply-chain Enthusiasts) - The Official Operations Club of SIMSR. In my tenure, I got exposure to the leadership position and lead a team of about 50 members working towards enhancing knowledge of Operations Domain at SIMSR, conducting Global Level SCM Conference, Operations & Logistics based events, administrating research opportunities to operations students, conducting KPMG Six Sigma Green- Belt Certification Course and bringing in opportunities for operations based con-current corporate projects for SIMSR students.

Reach to me at dheeravarandani@gmail.com for further queries and interaction.

Second Prize in MICANVAS-2016 BrandScript Web Series Competition
awards.description:
Product Placement in Branding of product has off late gained popularity and has also become source of Brand Awareness and Brand Positioning.
BrandScript Web Series Competition Event by MICANVAS- 2016 was a remarkable platform to implement our creative ideas for a Product Placement Strategy in Webseries. Various Brands like Cantabil Clothing, Havmor Ice-cream, Zomato App, Power Grid Corporation of India and many more were advertised using a 7-minute long video. It was a unique and an enriching experience.

awards.title: Third Prize in National-Level Live Project Competition - "Build A Business"​
awards.description: Careers360.com offered a Live Project Competition 2.0 - " Build A Business" where using Facebook Adverts we were given a task to generate maximum impressions and Oranganic and Inorganic Reach of the website within a budget of Rs.2000/- for the time spam of 10 days.

awards.title: Top Campus Ambassador for INflux 2016
awards.description: Being a Campus Ambassador for INflux Event which is conducted every year by Indian Institute of Management, Indore (Mumbai Campus), I had promoted the event within my Campus at K. J. Somaiya Institute of Management Studies and Research (SIMSR).

contributors.headline: Service Architect Business Analyst at Philips

projects.title: Performance Score Card Using R Programming
projects.description:
It was a great learning experience to design a prototype of a "Employee Performance Scorecard" model using R -Language.
The model helps the operations team to determine the holistic performance of an employee considering their productivity volumes, Quality KPIs (DPMO) met and Accuracy metrics.

contributors.headline: Service Architect Business Analyst at Philips

projects.title: Text Mining Based RCA Analysis Using R Programming
projects.description: Built a prototype of performing Text-Based RCA Analysis on the 5Y Methodology Data to determine the cause and effect of the operational error/delays in BPO Data process using R Language.

contributors.headline: Service Architect Business Analyst at Philips

profile_positions.description: Starting a new position as Service Architect/Business Analyst at Philips to define and implement Business Architecture for healthcare services offered by Philips.
profile_positions.title: Service Architect/Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
-- Part of Consulting Business Process Management (BPM) Team at Accenture Capability Network SC&O.
-- Working as Process Consultant for Global Oil & Gas Major to offer Business Architecture Consulting for their downstream and global functions
-- Delivered value through institutionalizing new Enterprise Architecture tool for the client’s global functions and was responsible for content migration from earlier existing BPM tool to new tool, business on-boarding, training and change management
-- Driving operational excellence for clients’ downstream systems which includes conducting strategic discussions with each of the businesses to understand pain points and laying principles of knowledge management and process design
-- Enabled the client to embark on a continuous process transformation journey by performing As-Is analysis of existing processes.
-- Established a common process taxonomy across multiple divisions and subsidiaries by defining the complete L1-L3 process architecture and end to end scenarios to remove silos from the entire process journey
-- Conducted process maturity assessments and defined roadmaps for improvement of business architecture along with other continuous improvement initiatives
-- Designed RFPs as a part of new business development for Accenture in Process Mining and Intelligent Automations domain
profile_positions.title: Management Consulting Analyst

profile_positions.description:
1.	Successfully implemented a process improvement business solution in 15 Accounts for Life Science BU (Business Unit) to help the organization in improving its bottom line performance overall.
2.	Performed descriptive data analysis on employee performance data to generate actionable insights that help account leadership improve their on-floor productivity and efficiency.
3.	Created value by recommending solutions for challenges faced by leadership in streamlining the account processes.
4.	Standardized the metrics and the methodology to drive efficiency and increase utilization of resources available.
5.	 Based on Data Analysis reports, identified and implemented the various scope of improvement projects  in the delivery process to gain higher ROI.
6.	Captured the improvement trends and reiterated on the actions to be taken for further enhancements required in the processes.
7.	Ensured stakeholder engagement via various communication mediums like e-mailers, FGDs (Focus Group Discussions), Feedback and Q&A Sessions, and regular Leadership reviews.
8.	Designed and published various marketing collateral to increase awareness of the solution implemented and its impact on process in the form of Bi-monthly Newsletters, Standard Employee Engagement E-Mailers, Web Content for organization micro-website portal and useful documents for all stakeholders.

profile_positions.description: Melange sees an amalgamation of management events like case studies, simulation games, etc and Cultural events like Fashion show, Drama and Dance competitions. It gives a platform for all budding talents to put their best foot ahead and win rewarding prizes. Melange also witnesses Star Nights with eminent celebrities coming to campus like Zakhir Khan, Nucleya, Euphoria, etc. Being the PR Head for Melange 2018, which happens on 9th and 10th February 2018, My responsibility is to ensure the smooth functioning of the PR and External relations of Melange.
profile_positions.title: Head Of Public Relations

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities include:
•	Originally on boarded as Key Account Manager for 2 accounts, showed initiative and skillset to support and deliver in other verticals too.
•	Conceptualization and servicing of products in Consulting Domain.
•	Sole owner of Social Media Marketing across all products and services.
•	Solely handling 2 products offered for both existing and new clients.
•	Strategized and implemented new channel distribution partners.
•	Successfully converted 2 partners, 1 from Mumbai and 1 National level lead.
•	Acting relationship Manager for 1 Key Accounts.
•	Acting as a liaison between Business Development Team and Functional Team (Quality Improvement, IT, Legal)
•	Part of core team for recruitment.
•	Supported Recruitment campaigns to increase the size of teams by 2FTEs.
profile_positions.title: Manager

profile_positions.description:
OTET is an IT Solution Provider Organization. One of it's product is OTET - Protect. It is an attendance tracking system for schools and colleges. the scond product line is OTET-iCare which is an end-to-end Hospital Management System. Being Marketing Intern at OTET, l worked towards increasing it's sales, developing awareness campaigns and implementing digital marketing strategies for it's promotion. 
Responsibilities include:
1) Creating pitch deck for two product lines offered by the company.
2) Reaching out to new leads through cold calling and personal selling.
3) Negotiating on the prices offered to come up with a win-win situation for both client and employer.
4) Generated 1 lead for one school management system.
5) Worked as Business Analyst to suggest improvisation and customization in product as per customer requirements.
6) Devised new strategies to attract new leads for hospital management system.
7) Worked as Digital Account Manager for Facebook and LinkedIn account of the company.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Intern

volunteer_experiences.description:
Having the privilege of being associated with Sant Nirankari Mission since my childhood, has not only enriched my spiritual interests but also gave me an opportunity to give back to the society what I have received. Volunteering in various verticals as Sewa has surely helped to develop a better person in me. 
Currently, working for S.N.C.F (Sant Nirankari Charitable Foundation) as a translators for International Chiropractic Doctors, it has given exposure to real life issues faced by niche Indian rural inhabitants and helped me gain insights of the problems faced by them.

As an Active Volunteer for Accenture CSR Activities, I got a gamut of opportunities that included teaching Basic English Grammar and Personality Development skills for adults at LRC NGO, Thane; Teaching Basic Computer usage to specially abled kids at Skills and Ability School, Mulund West and Conducting Interactive sessions with KSWA Women Centre at Bhandup.

KJ SIMSR gave me an opportunity to volunteer and  continue working for society and specially children. 
At Ankur ELI, Kids of S.K.Somaiya's Vinay Mandir School (Gujarati Medium) are taught Basic Spoken English. Every friday 2-4:30 we conduct this session for students of 5th to 8th Standard. I personally, also, handle the Social Media Marketing of ANKUR ELI to promote the CSR activities done by KJ SIMSR.
